markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Draconic Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=5737) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dragonblood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=794" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 46 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your sense of smell has heightened to be as keen as that of a dragon. You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet. At their discretion, the GM might double this range if you're downwind from the creature or halve this range if you're upwind.
name: Draconic Scent
